mapper.select: SELECT a.orgid, a.name as orgname, a.comment, (SELECT korname FROM info_userinfo c WHERE a.prno = c.userno) as prname, (SELECT korname FROM info_userinfo c WHERE a.vprno1 = c.userno) as vprname1, (SELECT korname FROM info_userinfo c WHERE a.vprno2 = c.userno) as vprname2, b.name as orgtype FROM info_organization a LEFT JOIN cod_orgtype b ON a.orgtypeid = b.orgtypeid WHERE a.orgtypeid = #{orgtypeid}
SELECT filecontent as fileContent FROM info_organization WHERE orgid = #{orgid}
